name: angelspetrochem
title: Angel-石油化工
author: Arch666Angel
description: 超详细的还原现实的石油化工。 依赖: 完整的bob mod,Angel-精炼mod和Angel-无限矿物mod
description_original: PetroChems changes and adds Oil and Gas processing to a bobmods game, as well as a more complex web of chemical producation. Includes overrides and tie ins to bobs technologies and recipes. Depedencies: Full Bobs, Angels Refining and InfiniteOres
